WELCOME: Welcome! You can either select a config from our channel to receive it here or use the 'get config' button below.
JOIN_FIRST_AND_THEN_RETRY: To use this bot, you must be subscribed to the following channel(s). First subscribe, then start the bot again.
SUBSCRIPTION_VERIFIED: Subscription verified. You can now select a config from out channel to get it here in the bot.
NOT_AUTHORIZED: You are not authorized to perform this action.
CREATOR: Creator
NO_TOKEN: There are no tokens. Please add a token first.
NO_TOKEN_LEFT: There no tokens left to show.
WAIT_BETWEEN_REQUESTS_2: minute(s) to request a new set of configs.
